easy.title: Being Safe & Kind

steps.text: It is raining outside and you need to go to school.
steps.positive: Take an umbrella and go carefully.
steps.negativeFeedback: Running in the rain without protection can make you sick. Being prepared keeps you healthy and safe.
steps.lesson: Always be prepared and take care of your health.

steps.text: You see a classmate struggling with books.
steps.negativeFeedback: Ignoring someone in need can make them feel sad. Helping others builds kindness and friendship.
steps.lesson: Helping others makes the world a better place.

easy.ending: You made safe and kind choices today!

steps.text: You find a wallet in the playground.
steps.negativeFeedback: Keeping something that does not belong to you is dishonest. Returning it shows honesty and respect.
steps.lesson: Honesty is always the right choice.

steps.text: Your friend asks you to copy homework.
steps.negativeFeedback: Copying homework is unfair and stops real learning. Everyone should do their own work.
steps.lesson: Hard work and honesty help you learn better.

steps.text: Someone makes fun of you in class.
steps.positive: Stay calm and inform a teacher.
steps.negativeFeedback: Shouting back can make the situation worse. Staying calm shows strength and self-respect.
steps.lesson: Respect yourself and handle problems calmly.

steps.text: You made a mistake in a group project.
steps.positive: Accept it and try to fix it.
steps.negativeFeedback: Blaming others avoids responsibility. Accepting mistakes helps you grow and learn.
steps.lesson: Taking responsibility is a sign of maturity.
